question: 遣う
userAnswer: <ja>使う</ja> to{} use {thing|person|resource} <tag>(may imply being considerate | careful)</tag>
activeAnswer: <ja>使う</ja> to{} use {thing|person|resource} <tag>(may imply being considerate | careful)</tag>
sourceMnemonic: The kanji means <kanji>dispatch</kanji> but this word is <vocabulary>to consider</vocabulary> or <vocabulary>to make use of</vocabulary>. Just think about how if you have people that are on dispatch for you, you can send them information <vocabulary>to consider</vocabulary> and <vocabulary>to make use of</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This has a similar meaning to <ja>使う</ja>, and has the same reading too. If you remember that, you can remember this word's reading.
